title: "Democratising deep learning for microscopy with ZeroCostDL4Mic"
excerpt: "Deep learning methods show great promise for the analysis of microscopy images but there is currently an accessibility barrier to many users. Here the authors report a convenient entry-level deep learning platform that can be used at no cost: ZeroCostDL4Mic."
